text: The Colombo Air Symposium 2017 themed Airpower in Addressing Asymmetric Threats. will be held at the Eagles Lakeside Banquet and Convention Hall, Attidiya, Colombo, Sri Lanka today and tomorrow (12th and 13th Oct.).Military leaders, technical experts, global think tanks and diplomats representing all regions of the world will come together to share their knowledge and proficiency to build up a unified global airpower to address common challenges imposed by our collective future.The event is organized by the Sri Lanka Air Force annually with a e view of developing a wider perspective of the world of airpower and to increase the cooperation, understanding and goodwill among the representing nations.
title: 'Colombo Air Symposium - 2017' begins
